title: Universiti Malaya Residential College Platform
description: A web application that is designed to optimize Universiti Malaya's residential colleges information management as well as centralizing all residential college related processes such as accommodation application and residential college rating.

title: Expense Manager
description: A web application to help users to manage their expenses, savings and loans. A collaboration project with 5 other students for Component-based Software Engineering course. The project is built using Java Spring Boot for the backend and NextJS for the frontend.

title: Objetivo
description: A web application to help users to set personal goals, manage and keep track of the progress of their goals. A collaboration project with 6 other students.
